{"title": "Spin Six", "title_search": "spin six", "title_keyword": "spin six", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/spin-six/", "summary": "[DSiWare]  Spin Six is a puzzle game in which you rotate numbered panels to line them up and make them disappear. The real challenge lies in your ability to create chains of uninterrupted changing or elimination of panels and to connect many chains to score big points. Puzzle mode offers nearly 200 puzzles to solve, either in the One-Turn or Chain categories, while Time Attack mode allows you to challenge yourself to see how quickly you can eliminate a set number of panels. If you're more into points, the goal of Score Attack mode is to see how many points you can score within a set time limit (make the Spinnerator appear and get into Fever Time to really maximize your score!). Chain Challenge mode is all about the number of chains you can make without interruption. Give Spin Six a whirl to discover its multiple modes and deep yet easy-to-master game play.", "genre": ["Matching Puzzle"], "metascore": "74", "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-06-21", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-157343-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-157345-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": "Mixed or average", "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["Japan", "North America", "Europe"], "companies": ["Zener Works (Developer)", "Nintendo (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["DS"], "rating": "E"}

{"title": "Zombie Wonderland", "title_search": "zombie wonderland", "title_keyword": "zombie wonderland", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/zombie-wonderland/", "summary": "50% OFF SALE TO CELEBRATE THE LAUNCH!!!!  Load up your weapons, grab your mop and prepare to blast the Zombie pests clean out of town!   ABOUT The simple townsfolk of Niceville need Chuck to deal with their pesky zombie infestation, but they’re not going to be pleased if he leaves lots of Greenie guts behind by sunrise! Blast away at hordes of shuffling reanimates on four different levels, until the zombie rooster crows at 06:00 am.   FRANTIC GAMEPLAY  Tap the zombies to make Chuck run from window to window, dealing with undead attackers on every side. But don’t forget to scrub the floor if a zombie gets inside!   STORY AND SURVIVAL MODES Face five increasingly intense evenings of zombie terror in four different locations in the Story Mode. Begin at Aunt Lilly’s house and unlock Joe’s Bar, Jake’s Garage and the Cemetery so you can experience the terror again in Survival Mode.   FOUR DIFFERENT ENEMY TYPES  Fight the Greenies, Flamies, Grannies and Meanies, to keep the place squeaky clean. Be sure to prioritize who you kill first though – some zombies shuffle more quickly than others!   UPGRADE YOUR FIREPOWER Unlock bigger and more menacing weapons to cope with the escalating onslaught of brain hungry groaners. Borrow Aunt Lilly’s box of Super Slug bullets, mount a machine gun sentry on the window sill, and even upgrade your mop and bucket to a Gutvac super vacuum for those hard-to-shift blood stains.   FULL CRYSTAL SUPPORT Win achievements and track your score on Crystal’s Global Online Leader Boards.", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": "60", "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-06-11", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-157589-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-157589-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": "Mixed or average", "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Chillingo (Publisher)", "Chillingo (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "7 Hand Poker", "title_search": "7 hand poker", "title_keyword": "7 hand poker", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/7-hand-poker/", "summary": "7 Hand Poker on your iDevice  Features:  The game is designed for two players. {"title": "Hanafuda Koi-Koi ver.", "title_search": "hanafuda koikoi ver", "title_keyword": "hanafuda koikoi ver", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/hanafuda-koi-koi-ver/", "summary": ""Hanafuda koi-koi ver." is an application that lets you play the traditional Japanese card game "Hanafuda koi-koi". The premise of the game is, using a deck of 48 cards, to make pairs of matching cards. Though this seems simple, there's a lot of fun and complexity in reading your opponent, general strategizing, and mastering the game.  Please enjoy A Japanese traditional card game with beautiful graphic and unique BGM.  Rules: A deck of Hanafuda cards has twelve suits, which each suit corresponding to a different month. Every card belongs to one of the twelve suits, thus every suit has a total of four cards in it. If you collect and make special card combinations called 'yaku', you get bonus points or a "special score." The winner in each game is the person who leaves from the game first. It is possible to be out, if you get at least one point  About "Koi-Koi": When someone gets a special score, they must decide whether to continue or end the game. This decision is known as Koi-Koi. Getting the third "Koi-Koi" will make your score double, getting the fourth "Koi-Koi" will make your score triple, and getting the fifth "Koi-Koi" will make your score quadruple. Use "Koi-Koi" cunningly and have fun!  It's easy to play: -To select a card, just tap it. -The first tap selects a card, the second tap flips it over. -Also, when you select a card, the cursor will automatically highlight any other card you can take, making it easy for beginners.  Game Features: -Tutorial -Help -List of Cards -World Ranking", "genre": ["Board"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-12-19", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-137296-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-137296-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Evolve (Publisher)", "Evolve (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}
